definition: an electric circuit that cuts off a receiver when the signal becomes weaker than the noise, suppress or crush completely
details:
noun
- an electric circuit that cuts off a receiver when the signal becomes weaker than the noise
= synonyms: squelch circuit
- a crushing remark
= synonyms: squelcher, takedown, put-down
verb
- suppress or crush completely
= example: suppress or crush completely
= synonyms: quench, quell
- to compress with violence, out of natural shape or condition
= synonyms: squeeze
- walk through mud or mire
= synonyms: splash
- make a sucking sound
